title: I Just Went Through the Saks Fifth Avenue Sale—20 Pieces to Shop Before It Ends
excerpt: From Courrèges to Leset, there's no shortage of luxury designers and mid-range brands discounted.
text: If there were ever a time to shop at Saks Fifth Ave, it's right now—while they're having a sale.So many pieces that are perfect for spring are included: midis, maxis, pointelle knits, and more. From Courrèges to Leset, there's no shortage of luxury designers and mid-range brands discounted. And if you're looking something more specific, like a wedding guest dress or swimwear for a summer vacation, there are plenty of good finds. I even saw standouts from Proenza Schouler and MM6 Maison Margiela.They're offering 20% off when you spend $250 or more (which, honestly, is easy to hit at Saks)—now through April 13, with the code HAPPY20SF. Here are 20 pieces worth checking out. Proenza Schouler Silo Leather Shoulder Bag Leset Pointelle-Knit Classic Tank I would love a Leset pointelle set. Leset Pointelle Burnout Crop Pants Faithfull the Brand Aya Smocked Cover-Up Midi-Dress There are so many white midi dresses on sale. MM6 Maison Margiela Hook-And-Eye Stretch Cotton Midi-Dress I always love looking at MM6. Staud Ellison Rib-Knit Sleeveless Midi-Dress This Staud dress is cute. M.M.LaFleur Carmela Dress I'm always into contrast stitching. Leset Rio Flared Crop Pants Faithfull the Brand Auve Cotton Midi-Dress Faithfull the Brand has so many dresses on sale. Hunza G Crinkle-Effect Scoopneck Bikini I can't stop look at bikinis. Faithfull the Brand Ostano Cotton Midi-Dress I love the simplicity of this one. Proenza Schouler Small Leather Shoulder Bag More from Proenza Schouler. Solid & Striped The Lolita Cotton Halter Midi-Dress Staud Wylie Cotton A-Line Midi-Dress This A-line midi is chic. LoveShackFancy Suvi Lace-Trimmed Cotton Fit & Flare Maxi Dress Such a perfect dress for spring and summer. Splits59 Simona Airweight Tank Dress I'm a huge fan of workout dresses. Nensi Dojaka Sleeveless Asymmetric Maxi Dress Nensi Dojaka for 20% off. Proenza Schouler White Label Kendall Pleated Fit & Flare Midi-Dress You could wear this to a wedding. Leset Yoko Cotton Halterneck Maxi Dress The low back on this looks so good. Staud Procida Cotton Maxi Skirt
html:
If there were ever a time to shop at Saks Fifth Ave, it's right now—while they're having a sale.

So many pieces that are perfect for spring are included: midis, maxis, pointelle knits, and more. From Courrèges to Leset, there's no shortage of luxury designers and mid-range brands discounted. And if you're looking something more specific, like a wedding guest dress or swimwear for a summer vacation, there are plenty of good finds. I even saw standouts from Proenza Schouler and MM6 Maison Margiela.

They're offering 20% off when you spend $250 or more (which, honestly, is easy to hit at Saks)—now through April 13, with the code HAPPY20SF. Here are 20 pieces worth checking out.

Proenza Schouler

Silo Leather Shoulder Bag

Leset

Pointelle-Knit Classic Tank

I would love a Leset pointelle set.

Leset

Pointelle Burnout Crop Pants

Faithfull the Brand

There are so many white midi dresses on sale.

I always love looking at MM6.

This Staud dress is cute.
